path: artifacts/Catcoin Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

project_path.CATCOIN: contracts/Catcoin Full Smart Contract Security Audit/CATCOIN

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions `includeAccount()` and `_getCurrentSupply` use loops that may cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the excluded addresses list is too long.
findings.location: `includeAccount()` and `_getCurrentSupply` functions in the CATCOIN contract
